topic.title: Quick Assist Support for ID/IDREFS in Text Mode

body.p: The Quick Assist support is activated automatically when you place the caret inside and ID or an IDREF. To access it, click the yellow bulb help marker placed on the caret line, in the line number stripe of the editor. You can also invoke the quick assist menu if you press Alt + 1Ctrl + 1(Meta + Alt + 1Meta 1 on Mac OS X) on your keyboard.
